1.name: The Shining
1.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

2.name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
2.description: After the rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

3.name: The Blue Lagoon
3.description: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

4.name: Airplane!
4.description: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

5.name: Caddyshack
5.description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

6.name: Raging Bull
6.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring destroys his life outside of it.

7.name: The Blues Brothers
7.description: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

8.name: Flash Gordon
8.description: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

9.name: Nine to Five
9.description: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

10.name: Cannibal Holocaust
10.description: During a rescue mission into the Amazon rainforest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

11.name: Friday the 13th
11.description: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp which, years before, was the site of a child's drowning.

12.name: The Elephant Man
12.description: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.

13.name: Popeye
13.description: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

14.name: Urban Cowboy
14.description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

15.name: Ordinary People
15.description: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

16.name: Inferno
16.description: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

17.name: Dressed to Kill
17.description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

18.name: Superman II
18.description: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

19.name: Heaven's Gate
19.description: A dramatization of the real-life Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, in which a Sheriff born into wealth, attempts to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

20.name: The Final Countdown
20.description: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

21.name: The Fog
21.description: An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.

22.name: Altered States
22.description: A Harvard scientist conducts experiments on himself with a hallucinatory drug and an isolation chamber that may be causing him to regress genetically.

23.name: Stir Crazy
23.description: Set up and wrongfully accused, two best friends will be sent to prison for a crime they didn't commit. However, no prison cell could keep them locked in.

24.name: Fame
24.description: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

25.name: Cruising
25.description: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

26.name: Battle Beyond the Stars
26.description: A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors.

27.name: The Changeling
27.description: A man staying at a secluded historical mansion finds himself being haunted by the presence of a spectre.

28.name: La boum
28.description: This is the story about the first love experiences of a teenage-girl.

29.name: The Gods Must Be Crazy
29.description: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.

30.name: American Gigolo
30.description: A Los Angeles male escort, who mostly caters to an older female clientèle, is accused of a murder which he did not commit.

31.name: Coal Miner's Daughter
31.description: Biographical story of Loretta Lynn, a legendary country singer that came from poverty to worldwide fame. She rose from humble beginnings in Kentucky to superstardom and changing the sound and style of country music forever.

32.name: Somewhere in Time
32.description: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

33.name: Humanoids from the Deep
33.description: Scientific experiments backfire and produce horrific mutations: half man, half fish, which terrorize a small fishing village by killing the men and raping the women.

34.name: My Bodyguard
34.description: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

35.name: Xanadu
35.description: A struggling artist living in Los Angeles meets a girl who may hold the key to his happiness.

36.name: Used Cars
36.description: When the owner of a struggling used car lot is killed, it's up to the lot's hot-shot salesman to save the property from falling into the hands of the owner's ruthless brother and used-car rival.

37.name: Any Which Way You Can
37.description: A trucker turned prize fighter, his brother and their pet orangutan have a series of misadventures involving the mob, corrupt cops, motorcycle gangs and pretty dames.

38.name: Saturn 3
38.description: Two lovers stationed at a remote base in the asteroid fields of Saturn are intruded upon by a retentive technocrat from Earth and his charge: a malevolent eight foot robot.

39.name: Prom Night
39.description: At a high school senior prom, a masked killer stalks four teenagers who were responsible for the accidental death of a classmate six years previously.

40.name: Maniac
40.description: A psychotic man, troubled by his childhood abuse, loose in New York City, kills young women and takes their scalps as his trophies. Will he find the perfect woman in a photographer, and end his killing spree?

41.name: The Long Riders
41.description: The origins, exploits and the ultimate fate of the Jesse James gang is told in a sympathetic portrayal of the bank robbers made up of brothers who begin their legendary bank raids because of revenge.

42.name: The Long Good Friday
42.description: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

43.name: Brubaker
43.description: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.

44.name: Foxes
44.description: A group of four teenage girls come of age in the asphalt desert of Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley arranged with a blazing soundtrack and endless drinking, drugs and sex.

45.name: Kagemusha
45.description: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

46.name: Smokey and the Bandit II
46.description: The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.

47.name: The Big Red One
47.description: A hardened sergeant and the four core members of his infantry unit try to survive World War II as they move from battle to battle throughout Europe.

48.name: Little Darlings
48.description: Two fifteen year-old girls from different sides of the tracks compete to see who will be first to lose their virginity while at camp.

49.name: Paura nella città dei morti viventi
49.description: A reporter and a psychic race to close the Gates of Hell after the suicide of a clergyman caused them to open, allowing the dead to rise from their graves.

50.name: Alligator
50.description: A baby alligator is flushed down a Chicago toilet and survives by eating discarded laboratory rats injected with growth hormones. The small reptile grows gigantic, escapes the city sewers, and goes on a rampage.
